techmeme.title: Source: EU regulators are set to announce that Apple must step into line with strict new rules on making OSes fully functional with other tech under the DMA (Samuel Stolton/Bloomberg)

Bluesky addresses how it approaches trust and safety concerns on the platform, including piloting initiatives to deal with bad actors, abuse, and spam (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
A UN advisory body makes seven recommendations for governing AI, including establishing a panel to provide impartial and reliable scientific knowledge about AI (Supantha Mukherjee/Reuters)
